issue.title: [Developer][Packaging] Nightly build report's subject should contain Arrow
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6524](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6524). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Something like: "[NIGHTLY] Arrow build report for job <job-id>"

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6524?focusedCommentId=16927299) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5347
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5347>
